about.name: Nisanur Eser
about.title: Computer Engineering
about.description: I am a Computer Engineering graduate, and my interest in web interface development has led me to specialize in the frontend field. I have built a strong technical foundation in modern technologies such as React, TypeScript, JavaScript, and Sass. I continuously work on improving myself in areas such as frontend architectures, component-based structures, responsive design, and testing processes. I stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry practices to expand my technical knowledge. As a developer who values detail, is eager to learn, and prioritizes user experience, I am shaping my career along a frontend-focused path.

description: Gained hands-on experience in PHP and JavaScript, enhancing both foundational and advanced skills.
Acquired practical knowledge in software development processes including technical documentation, debugging, and UI implementation.

internship2.company: Umur Printing Industry and Trade Joint Stock Company
description: Actively contributed to a live company project using React, TypeScript and Sass, with a focus on component-based architecture and clean UI design.
Collaborated with the development team to build scalable, maintainable front-end modules aligned with design specifications.
Developed unit tests using the Jest testing framework to ensure code reliability and functionality.

Developed an interactive delivery management system with real-time map integration and route optimization using Google Maps API, Leaflet, and Next.js + TypeScript. Built a secure ASP.NET Core–based admin panel with role-based access control and essential security practices to ensure safe and efficient system management
